mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.password, u.nick_name, u.salt, u.token, u.is_deleted, u.gmt_create, u.gmt_modified, aur.role_id from acl_user u inner join acl_user_role aur on u.id = aur.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into acl_user (id, username, password, nick_name, salt, token, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{nickName},#{salt},#{token},#{isDeleted},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified})
insert into acl_user_role (id, role_id, user_id, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{id},#{roleId},#{id},#{isDeleted},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified})
mapper.update:
update acl_user au,acl_user_role aur
au.username = #{username},
au.password = #{password},
au.nick_name = #{nickName},
au.salt = #{salt},
au.token = #{token},
au.gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
aur.role_id = #{roleId},
where au.id = aur.user_id and au.id = #{id}
